ai-mil7.2.6:1.1_0: “Venerable Sister, what are the five factors should be called by one of them?”
ai-mil7.2.6:1.2_0: “Great king, just as a water rinsing water is in the water
ai-mil7.2.6:1.3_0: In the same way, anyone who meditates spreading a heart full of love to the whole world—abundant, expansive, limitless, free of enmity and ill will.
ai-mil7.2.6:1.4_0: This is the first thing, great king, for all the factors.
ai-mil7.2.6:2.1_0: Furthermore, a mendicant places water on the banks of the river, if someone were to catch it, saying: ‘If I see anyone else to me in the water, they’ll see me.’
ai-mil7.2.6:2.2_0: In the same way, great king, one who practices like a wild colt with the defilements—against if you’re uncleared in the opposite directions, one who thinks: ‘I’m able to see me again.’
ai-mil7.2.6:2.3_0: This is the second way to get upset.
ai-mil7.2.6:3.1_0: Furthermore, great king, having left the water on the body, stroke the rain,
ai-mil7.2.6:3.2_0: In the same way, a meditator should settle the meditation on idea to drink, without residing within the place where he can rightly go back, Suppiya.
ai-mil7.2.6:3.3_0: This is the third way to get upset.
ai-mil7.2.6:4.1_0: Furthermore, great king, after digging the earth in earth, and cast by the winds.
ai-mil7.2.6:4.2_0: In the same way, when someone with possessions, honor, and popularity—give up possessions, honor, and popularity, and popularity—from the top of their foes, they must get caught up in the horns, not too quickly.
ai-mil7.2.6:5.2_0: a monk should stay in lodgings
ai-mil7.2.6:6.1_0: Furthermore, when he wanders on walking tour he sees a sound, he sees that noise in his own ears or near the limbs, and he stays silently there.
ai-mil7.2.6:6.2_0: In the same way, when you’re traveling with all the carpets, all the sounds of tricks, dodges, and evasions, and embraces, he should make an effort to get rid of the sharks and the carpets.
ai-mil7.2.6:6.4_0: The Buddha has spoken about the Divinities’ Father
ai-mil7.2.6:7.1_0: ‘You have given up the barber to their own home,
ai-mil7.2.6:7.2_0: as a tortoise draws its limbs into its shell.
ai-mil7.2.6:8.1_0: The sixth enquiry is the sixth enquiry.
